document.full_text: an inspired lebron james delivered the decisive blow with the last 10 points as the miami heat beat the boston celtics 97-87 on wednesday to book their place in the eastern conference finals.
document.title: james delivers fatal blow as heat finish off celtics
lines_and_colors: an inspired lebron james delivered the decisive blow with the last 10 points as the miami heat beat the boston celtics 97-87 on wednesday to book their place in the eastern conference finals.
